spec-post-merge-stabilization.title: Post-Merge Stabilization Audit (Wave 3.3/4.0)
spec-post-merge-stabilization.instruction_raw: Audit the recent merge of Wave 3.3 and 4.0. Analyze the TypeError in household tests regarding EconStateDTO and the 0 == 10.0 failure in EconomicIndicatorTracker. Identify all affected DTO callsites and provide a strict stabilization Spec for fixing them, ensuring decimal/penny consistency across all systems.
